item.title: Hack the Box - The Notebook
item.description: OSINT Nmap The following nmap command was executed in order to obtain information about the machine: nmap -p- -o nmap_output 10.129.124.15 Nmap scan report for thenotebook.htb (10.129.124.15) Host is up (0.037s latency). Not shown: 65532 closed ports PORT STATE SERVICE 22/tcp open ssh 80/tcp open http 10010/tcp filtered rxapi Based on the nmapout results, we see there is an uncommon service running on port 10010, called rxapi.
